item.title: Raft Consensus Algorithm
item.description: Raft is a consensus algorithm that is designed to be easy to understand.

item.title: A Meditation on Matcha
item.description: I often drink matcha. Matcha is a bright green powder ground from green tea leaves. Taking matcha powder and swirling it into water renders a luxuriant smooth tea. A cup of matcha, as imagined by Midjourney. This tea is something of substance — a suspension that would not be the same without its constituent components — a solid and a liquid blended into something entirely new.
item.author: (author)

item.title: Either - Error Handling in Functional Programming | Sandro Maglione
item.description: Either allows to explicitly handle errors in your code. Either is an alternative to try/catch. Let's learn how Either works, how it is defined, and how it differs from try/catch.

item.title: Fast Tokenizers with StringScanner | Tenderlove Making
item.description: Lately I’ve been messing around with writing a GraphQL parser called TinyGQL. I wanted to see how fast I could make a GraphQL parser without writing any C extensions. I think I did pretty well, but I’ve learned some tricks for speeding up parsers and I want to share them.
